DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_03_04: Oh... good evening! Beautiful weather, isn't it?
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_03_06: That's why my friend and I decided to go for a walk! We like to get some fresh air after a tiring day, and it's not forbidden, right?
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_15_07: And why would I accuse you of anything illegal? Two strollers, big deal.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_03_08: That's it! Dear officers, you can keep patrolling, there's nothing interesting going on here! Only honest people! Well, except for the one in the villa...
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_15_09: Do you have a problem with its owner?
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_03_10: Problem? No, of course not! We've only heard rumors that he exploits the poor, increases interest after the loan is granted, that sort of thing.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoAway_15_01: If he's so dishonest, why don't you just stay away from him? You can walk anywhere, after all.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoAway_15_03: One more thing. What's that smell?
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoAway_03_04: The smell? Oh, it must be us. We were visiting relatives at the tannery today. Do you know how they smell? A normal person can't stand it for long!
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoAway_15_05: Well, the problem is, it's not the smell of leather. It's more like, excuse me, shit. A lot of it.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoAway_03_06: Em... No way! Officer, to pick on the smell of random people like that? That's rude!
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoodNight_15_01: Since you're not doing anything, we're moving on.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoodNight_03_02: Of course! Have a great patrol with no intervention!
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoodNight_15_03: No, thank you. I just hope that not all strollers in this city stink of, pardon me, dung.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoodNight_03_04: Well, being poor is no joy! We too should walk a bit further before the villa guards get angry with us!
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoodNight_15_05: Good idea. They may not be so generous.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoodNight_03_06: Like the boss, like the employees! Damn them! All they think about is money, no sensitivity to human misery! I'll show... I mean, it's time for another walk. Goodbye.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_ShowMe_15_01: Show me what you're hiding in there.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_ShowMe_15_03: You wanted to throw dung at the villa, huh? I can't let you do that.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_ShowMe_03_04: Uh... all right. There you go.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_ShowMe_03_05: And what are you gonna do about it?
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_ShowMe_15_06: It's none of your business. Get out of here.
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_DontBeDong_03_02: Of course not, officer! We were just out for a walk!
DIA_Ars_FMQ003_Villa_GoAway_Choice: Then maybe you should get out of here.
